message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very useful.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. I can come down to $105, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope this aligns with your decision.
